title: 5 Quick Steps to Make the Inventory Bar Bigger in Minecraft

steps.title: Launch Minecraft.
steps.content: Launch Minecraft . To make the inventory bar bigger in Minecraft, you'll just need to adjust the GUI (Graphical User Interface) scale. This will also change the size of the other HUD elements, such as your health, hunger, and experience bars.

steps.title: Select Options.
steps.content: Select Options . This is on the main menu. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Video Settings….
steps.content: Select Video Settings… . You can find this on the left side.

steps.title: Select GUI Scale.
steps.content: Select GUI Scale . It may be set to Auto or another setting.

steps.title: Select GUI Scale.
steps.content: Select GUI Scale . The scaling will change with each click. Some devices will have the options 1 (smallest), 2, 3, 4 (biggest), and Auto. Other devices will have small, medium, and large. Continue clicking until the GUI is the size you want. Changes will be saved automatically. You can also change your language or gamma settings .
